data.title: SteamWorld Heist II announced for PC and consoles, coming August 8th (UPDATE: reviews are out, see threadmarks)
data.text:
Comic Obsessed

Chain Chomp

Apr 17, 2024

#3

Eh, would have preferred Steamworld Dig 3.

Cubs017

Like Like

Apr 17, 2024

#4

Awesome. The first Steamworld Heist is probably a Top 5 Indie game on Switch for me. I really enjoyed it.

VintoWin

Like Like

Apr 17, 2024

#5

Eh, would have preferred Steamworld Dig 3.

Yeah exactly. I loved Dig 1 and 2....

Dig 3 is obviously coming at some point.

I really enjoyed Heist so am looking forward to this.

I needed this. With Steam Powered Giraffe. So happy!

Apr 17, 2024

#8

Cool. Still got some time to decide whether to play the first on my 3DS, Wii U or Switch copy until then!

Although I never noticed before how these robots are too lanky-legged for my complete comfort.

Apr 17, 2024

#10

Heist is probably my favorite Steamworld title (though I haven't played Quest) so super down for this

Apr 17, 2024

#11

Cant describe how happy I am about this.

Peak Image & Form (together with Dig 2)

I had a hunch about there being a new Steamworld game coming the last few days, they've been very talkative about the franchise on twitter as of late and heck and even liked my weird tweet the other day

Apr 17, 2024

#26

2D Valkyria Chronicles without the Capture the Flag aspect or the tanks?

Yeah I think that's a more apt comparison. Except often in Heist, you can have bullets bounce off walls (richoet), so sometimes it's like I'm playing a game of billards, lol. Find an awkward angle for that chance of a headshot.

infinitywave

Cappy

Pronouns

he / him

Apr 18, 2024

#27

FWIW, seems like Steam Powered Giraffe didn't make the full sound track this time, just selected tracks. (The trailer says: "Featuring music by Steam Powered Giraffe".)

They've made 15 original songs for the game. There'd be title and end music, they play on radios and at venues where you see the band actually playing, as well as some after special battles, but like the first Heist the ambient background music is made in-house.

Apr 18, 2024

#28

Those comparisons aren't right. Let me. I know how to sell a game:

It's Code Name S.T.E.A.M. where every character is Tin Man.

Apr 19, 2024

#29

I really loved playing the first game on 3DS all those years ago, so I’m ecstatic to see a sequel finally happening! Cool that Steam Powered Giraffe is involved again as well.

How times has changed since then. Gone seems the days when indie devs made highly tailor-made game experiences for a target platform.

#40

the Steampunk band "Steam Powered Giraffe" is involved with the game's soundtrack, after previously working on the original. (reportedly this was confirmed with the initial reveal, but this music video is new)

also their Youtube channel has a video of the game's director eating spicy wings with Playstation staffer Shuhei Yoshida, for some reason.
